question_stem.en: A 62-year-old man comes to the emergency department due to fever, productive cough, and dyspnea for the past several days. His symptoms are becoming progressively worse. The patient has underlying mild chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and has smoked a pack of cigarettes daily for the last 40 years. On examination, temperature is 38.3 C (100.9 F), pulse is 110/min, and respirations are 24/min. Auscultation of the right lung reveals bronchial breath sounds and crackles. {{exhibit_1}} shows leukocytosis. Chest x-ray is shown below.
question_stem.zh: 一名62岁男性因发热、咳痰和呼吸困难在过去几天内到急诊科就诊。他的症状正在逐渐恶化。患者患有潜在的轻度慢性阻塞性肺病，并且每天吸一包香烟，持续了40年。检查时，体温为38.3°C（100.9°F），脉搏为110次/分钟，呼吸为24次/分钟。右肺听诊显示支气管呼吸音和爆裂音。{{exhibit_1}}显示白细胞增多。胸部X光片如下所示。

question.en: The mediastinal contour obscured by the lung consolidation on this patient's chest x-ray is primarily formed by which of the following structures?
question.zh: 该患者胸片上被肺部实变遮盖的纵隔轮廓主要由以下哪种结构形成？

explanation.en:
This patient has acute lobar pneumonia with consolidation involving the right middle lobe. The right middle lobe of the lung lies immediately adjacent to the right border of the heart, and any condition that increases radiographic density in the right middle lobe will obscure the adjacent cardiac silhouette. On posteroanterior (PA) chest x-ray projections, the right atrium composes most of the right side of the cardiac silhouette.

(Choice A) The coronary sinus receives most of the venous drainage from the cardiac circulation. It courses posteriorly around the heart in the coronary sulcus to empty directly into the right atrium. It is difficult to visualize on standard chest x-ray.

(Choice B) The inferior vena cava empties into the right atrium in the thorax. It composes only the most inferior edge of the right border of the cardiac silhouette.

(Choice C) The pulmonary artery can be seen on PA chest x-ray on the left side of the cardiomediastinal silhouette just below the aortic arch.

(Choice E) The right ventricle forms the anterior wall of the heart and is best seen on lateral chest x-ray.

(Choice F) The superior vena cava is formed behind the first costal cartilage by the confluence of the right and left brachiocephalic veins. On PA chest x-ray, it is the flattened opacity parallel to the vertebral column that terminates inferiorly at the right atrium.

Educational objective:
On posteroanterior chest x-ray, the right middle lobe is seen adjacent to the right border of the heart, which is primarily formed by the right atrium. Consolidation in the right middle lobe can obscure the x-ray silhouette of the right heart border. {{exhibit_2}}
explanation.zh:
该患者患有急性大叶性肺炎，累及右肺中叶。右肺中叶紧邻心脏的右侧边缘，任何增加右肺中叶放射密度的情况都会遮盖邻近的心脏轮廓。在后前（PA）位胸片上，右心房构成心脏轮廓的右侧的大部分。

(选项 A) 冠状窦接收来自心脏循环的大部分静脉回流。它在冠状沟内绕心脏后方走行，直接排入右心房。在标准胸片上难以可视化。

(选项 B) 下腔静脉在胸腔内注入右心房。它仅构成心脏轮廓右侧边缘的最下端。

(选项 C) 肺动脉可在PA胸片上看到，位于心纵隔轮廓的左侧，主动脉弓下方。

(选项 E) 右心室形成心脏的前壁，最好在侧位胸片上看到。

(选项 F) 上腔静脉由右侧和左侧头臂静脉汇合而成，位于第一肋软骨的后方。在PA胸片上，它是在脊柱平行、扁平的阴影，在下方止于右心房。

教育目标：
在后前位胸片上，右肺中叶与心脏的右侧边缘相邻，而心脏的右侧边缘主要由右心房形成。右肺中叶的实变会遮盖右侧心缘的X线轮廓。{{exhibit_2}}

summary.en: The right atrium is the primary structure that forms the mediastinal contour obscured by lung consolidation on a chest x-ray. The right middle lobe of the lung lies adjacent to the right border of the heart, and consolidation in this area can obscure the cardiac silhouette.
summary.zh: 右心房是形成胸片上被肺部实变遮盖的纵隔轮廓的主要结构。右肺中叶与心脏的右侧边缘相邻，该区域的实变会遮盖心脏轮廓。
